name: Legendary Spork
description:
A work-in-progress traditional roguelike that I am currently toying around with.

Currently barely playable, it generates dungeons, you can run around, find and use items, hit goblins/orcs, descend deeper and die.

Controls:

  • Arrow keys, numpad or vi keys to move
  • G to pick up items
  • I to use items
  • D to drop items
  • R to unequip items
  • . or numpad 5 to skip a turn
  • < or PageDown to go down a floor
  • Escape to save and exit to the main menu

Currently my plans for this game is to learn and experiment with procedural generation and a bunch of other stuff, it may be abandoned at any time. Or I might keep developing it until it gets huge. Who knows.

There is currently no spork in the game. Which is why it's legendary.
